author: Special Correspondent
text:
A pedestrian was mowed down by a speeding cab on Ballari Road on Friday night. The deceased, Nazir Ahmed (80), a native of Mysuru, was in the city visiting his children in Kavalbyrasandra.

Ahmed was crossing the road, when a speeding cab, headed towards the Kempegowda International Airport, ran him over.

Their children informed the police that they do not know why their father was in the area.

The cab has been seized and the driver, Vishwanath, arrested, said the police.
title: Senior citizen hit by cab while crossing road dies
